portfolios.title: Quality Moat — Europe
portfolios.subtitle: High ROIC, conservative leverage, steady margins
portfolios.summary: Hypothesis: sustained ROIC > WACC with stable margins indicates durable advantage; rules codify quality, leverage ceilings, and cash conversion.
theory_paragraphs: Hypothesis: sustained ROIC > WACC with stable gross margins signals durable advantage.
Filters codify accounting quality, leverage ceilings, and cash conversion.
rules: Positive FCF in 4 of 5 last years
Quarterly rebalance, 20–30 names, equal weight, replace broken theses
methodology_notes: Cumulative returns are log-compounded weekly based on equal weights.
Dividends assumed reinvested on ex-date; FX at WM 4pm close.

portfolios.title: Value Turnaround — US
portfolios.subtitle: Cash-rich, self-help catalysts, insider alignment
portfolios.summary: Deep value + identifiable catalysts (buybacks, asset sales, margin recovery) with balance-sheet protection.
theory_paragraphs: Deep value screen with balance-sheet protection and identifiable catalysts.
Focus on buybacks, asset sales, margin recovery.
